item.title: Gnome Nord theme install script
item.description: Iâ€™ll start this post by saying that I have a thing for the Nord theme, every time I clean install a system I go through the trouble of applying the theme to everything, which got me thinking that I could automate most of it, at least for my gnome installs. More info on Nord theme ports here My script (also available here) should: Install the gtk/kvantum themes from https://github.com/EliverLara/Nordic Create the nord profile for gnome-terminal from https://github.
